course_title: Topics: Race, Gender, and the South: Race, Gender, & the South
class_notes:
Mammy and Jezebel: Race and Gender in the South


This course explores race and gender in the American south through two iconic and devastating stereotypes of Black Womanhood.
course_description:
The "South" has played a central role in our national imagination.This course explores the ways in which certain stereotypes suchas Southern Bell, Mammy, Southern
Gentleman, Jezebel, and Uncle Tom remain relevant across the decades.
sections: Class Nbr: 2103, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: K. Wallace-Sanders, Status: Open
